member.summary: Approves existing subscription - sets SubscriptionApproved to true. Checks if subscription wasn't already approved. Confirmation e-mail may be sent optionally.
member.param: Indicates if confirmation e-mail should be sent. Confirmation e-mail may also be sent if blog settings requires so
member.returns: Returns TRUE if subscription found and not already approved. Returns FALSE if subscription not found or already approved.
